page.title: 04THE RED LION PONTESBURY
page.content: The Red Lion is a public house in Pontesbury. The Landlord works from 8.00am until 3.30pm and again from 6.00pm until 12.00 midnight, clearing up and leaving things ready for opening time. Opening times are ll.30am to 3.00pm and 6.30pm to ll.00pm, when drinks and hot or cold meals are served. Any extension of these hours has to be applied for at the court in Shrewsbury. There is one other person to help prepare the food and then wash up. Over recent years there has been a drop in trade due more to people drinking at home, than the drink/drive laws. The Landlord is connected with the Shrewsbury and Wem breweries and so he buys all his stock from them.
